## FieldVariable.toXml() method

Serialize this field to XML.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fieldElement | Element | The element to populate with info about the field's state.  The element containing info about the field's state. |
